Try demo: Try it in a demo house

manager.bio: I have more than 15 years of experience in house-management.
manager.message: As Manager of Demo House I welcome you in our honline system.

admin.bio: I've been living in this house for more than 8 years. I work as an IT specialist, my hobby is diving. I believe this platform will help us exchange information and share ideas.

0.title: Bank loan for renovation
0.text: There is special offer from the bank for a one time loan that can be used for renovation.

comment.0: I think it is worth it. Interest is only 6%, repayment period is 10 years.
comment.1: Well, I'm not sure. We just got out from our last loan. Finally we can make the common cost lower, and now another loan?

1.title: Problem with the front door
1.text: Someone broke in the front door last week, it cannot be locked ever since

comment.0: Yes, I've already reported the problem. Earliest they can come fix it is next week.

2.title: Loud dog on the 4th floor
2.text: There is a dog on the 4th crying all day. The owner should not leave it alone all day.

comment.1: I apologize from everyone. The dog is ours, it ususally doesn't make any noise. But my granny was in the hospital, and it was left alone last week.
comment.2: Fortunately granny is out of hospital and back home from yesterday, so it won't be causing noise anymore. Sincere apologies from everyone.

0.title: Garbage Day on next Friday
0.text: Any dangerous materials and special garbage can be placed outside the front door on the previous day. And it will be taken away

1.title: Mandatory chimney checking
1.text:
Has to be done until the end of the month.
Please choose an appropriate date and schedule an appointment with the chimney checkers at +36(20)2569875.

loan.title: Bank loan for renovation
loan.text: We shall take a $100,000 special loan from the bank at 6% interest, repaying through the next 10 years.

parking.title: Guest parking lots
text: The parking lots for the guests of the house are used by other people, we should limit its use.
Proposed resolution: Let's establish telescopic parking guards in the two guest parking lots of the house, total cost is 46,200.- HUF. Each owner will get a key.

cleaning.title: Cleaning in winter
cleaning.text: As winter is here, the staircase is getting more dirty. I suggest increasing the regularity of the cleaning of the staircase to twice a week.

bicycleStorage.title: Bicycle storage
text: There is no safe storage for bicyles in the house. It would be advisable to construct a 12-seater storage on the garage level. In case of acceptance we will ask for 3 offers.

Proposed resolution: The house shall establish a bicycle storage from a maximum gross amount of 200,000 HUF on the garage level. The Manager is responsible for the request of offers and the execution. Deadline: 3 months from acceptance.

wallColor.title: Color of the building walls
wallColor.text: What color should we paint the building's walls during the renovation in August.

comment.0: Light colors are always prefered. Makes the area look brighter.
comment.1: OMG If you choose grey, I'm moving out!

manager.title: Replacement of Manager
manager.text: Let's have a vote in writing or hold an extraordinary meeting for this purpose. Those who agree to replace the manager, please support this proposal. If at least 10% of the ownership ratios support this proposal the current manager is obliged to open a vote on this issue. If he fail to do this within 30 days of the successful completion of this vote, the Audit Board shall do the same.

0.title: Caretaker agreement
0.text: Detailed caretaker duties list in the document store.

1.title: Elevator maintenance contract
1.text: Monthly planned maintenance and part supplly by warranty

2.title: building cleaning contract
2.text: Buildings cleaned once a week, halls cleaned daily

10.title: Billboard area rental
10.text: Billboard space rent on building, yearly contract

0.title: Elevator out of order
0.text: Stopped on the 6th floor. None of the buttons make it move.

comment.0: I called the elevator maintance company. If its a small fix, it is covered under our general maintance contract. We only need to pay if there is a major problem.
comment.1: Looks like its repairable easily, but they took the electric panel with them to their HQ, only there can they fix it. Unfortunately this means we need to wait a few days for them to bring it back.

1.title: My bathroom is being flooded from above.
1.text: A part of the ceiling has even fallen. I was lucky to not have my bath at that moment. I could be dead now.

comment.0: Fortunately our insurance covers these. I'm calling the insurance company right away
comment.1: They opened it up, and the insurance company took pictures. They will be coming to fix things up the day after tomorrow.
comment.2: The fix has been done. We are just waiting for the payment from the insurance
comment.3: The money arrived too. The bill has been paid today.

2.title: Electricity shortages
2.text: It is the third time that the electricity goes away for a period during the nigth.

comment.0: I reported to the electricity company last week. They are looking into it.

3.title: Cracks in the wall
3.text: On the second floor the wall is cracked, pieces of it fallen down.

comment.0: I can fix this next week. We only need to buy the materials.
comment.1: I will also paint it over nicely, we have some leftover paint. But the big ladder I can only get on Tuesday.
comment.2: I had some time over the weekend too to work on it. So I finished a bit earlier.
comment.3: Looks lovely Mr Baker! Looks just like a professional paint job.
comment.4: My grandfather was actually a professional painter.

messages.0: Hi! I've found your post box keys. You've left it in the post box. :)
messages.1: Ooops. Thanks a lot! I was looking for it, thought I lost it. I'll drop by to pick it up after dinner.
